(Constructor)

source code 

Initialise schedule.

Parameters:
  • dataSlotTime - Data slot duration (float, s).
  • syncSlotTime - Synchronisation slot duration (float, s).
  • dataSlots - List of device IDs indexed by allocated slot.
  • auxTxSlots - List of device IDs indexed by allocated auxillary TX slot.
  • auxRxSlots - List of device IDs indexed by allocated auxillary RX slot.
  • dataChannel - Channel identifier of master-slave channel.
  • auxChannel - Channel identifier of slave-slave channel.
